goal.ch: 本課程之主要目的在介紹同學們了解地球氣後系統中之基本物理過程，課程第一部分介紹氣候系統觀測上平均狀態和變化。第二部分利用不同複雜程度之簡單概念模式定性討論氣候、輻射、和能量間平衡關係，以及介紹地球物理流體動力學基礎。第三部分討論氣候模式在大氣、海洋、水文循環變遷議題之應用。
goal.en: “The purpose of this course is to provide a foundation in the physical understanding of the earth’s climate system. The first part of this course provides a description of the climate system based on observations of the mean climate state and its variability. The second part aims at developing a quantitative understanding of the processes that determine the climate state-radiation, heat balances, and the basics of the geophysical fluid dynamics using simple conceptual models of various complexities. Climate models’ applications changes of atmosphere, ocean, and hydrological cycle are discussed in the last part of this course.“

outline.ch:
“第一章：氣候系統介紹
第二章：觀測氣候平均態
第三章：觀測氣候自然變化
第四章：氣候系統輻射過程
第五章：氣候系統熱力學
第六章：氣候系統動力學
第七章：氣候變遷的輻射強迫
第八章: 氣候變遷的物理回饋過程
第九章: 氣候模擬與預報“
outline.en:
“Chapter 1 An Introduction to Climate System
Chapter 2 The Observed Climatology
Chapter 3 Observations of Natural Variability
Chapter 4 Radiative Processes in the Climate System
Chapter 5 Thermodynamics of the Climate System
Chapter 6 Dynamics of the Climate System
Chapter 7 Radiative Forcing of the Climate System
Chapter 8 Climate Change Processes
Chapter 9 Climate Simulation and Prediction“
